mapper.select: select status,user_code as userCode,update_time as updateTime,work_time as workTime from sc_gmuni_device where school_code=#{schoolCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and code=#{blowerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update sc_gmuni_device set status ='1', user_code =NULL, update_time =NULL, work_time =NULL where school_code=#{schoolCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and code=#{blowerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
